attributes.action: Name one of Her Majesties warships HMS Walker
attributes.additional_details:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederic_John_Walker

Walker sank more U-boats during the Battle of the Atlantic than any other British or Allied commander, and he was instrumental in the Allied victory of the Battle of the Atlantic.
attributes.background: Captain Walker was a superb Captain in WW2 in anti submarine warfare and died aged 48 in 1944. He was a highly decorated officer who died from exhaustion and overwork in 1944, his son was killed onboard HMSubmarine Parthian in 1943.
